TEXT.TITLE: DEN NORSKE CREDITBANK PROFIT RISES IN EIGHT MONTHS
TEXT.DATELINE: OSLO, Oct 20 - Eight months to August 31 -
TEXT.BODY: Ordinary net profit after provisions for losses and taxes 300 mln vs 203 mln Group operating profit before loan loss provisions 875 mln crowns vs 986 mln Total assests 132.0 billion crowns vs 107.6 billion Note - Full company name is Den Norske Creditbank <NCBO.OL> REUTER
